breasts.description: Her breasts are bountiful, impossibly large, too big to hold with both hands. Shaped like teardrops, they spill to each side when she lies down. Incredibly soft, yet firm. Her tummy is toned and defined, with no ribs in sight.

genitalia.description: Hung like a horse, her cock is as long as her thigh and so thick she can barely wrap both hands around it. When not erect, it retracts into a small but noticeable bulge.

back.description: A petite back like hers should not be able to support such large breasts, yet it endures. Topped with a long and fluffy foxtail, her plump buttcheeks protect her anus. Her testicles are small but possess infinite stamina.
